categories: Category:Solo: A Star Wars Story actors

nodes.text: Woodrow Tracy "Woody" Harrelson (born July 23, 1961) is an American actor, director, activitist and playwright who played Tobias Beckett in Solo: A Star Wars Story. Harrelson has described his role in the film as "a mentor to Han Solo" and "a bit of a criminal." He also starred in the 2017 sci-fi movie War for the Planet of the Apes, with Andy Serkis.
